meanings.sent1: The cake was so yummo that I couldn't stop eating it.
meanings.sent2: The pizza at the party was absolutely yummo.
meanings.sent3: The yummo brownies disappeared in seconds at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The yummo ice cream melted in my mouth like a sweet dream.
meanings.sent5: The yummo aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: (interjection) Used to express enjoyment or satisfaction with food.
meanings.sent2: Wow, yummo! I love this dessert.
meanings.sent3: Yummo, this burger is making my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: The flavors in this dish are yummo, like a symphony in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: Yummo! I can't get enough of this delicious treat.
